name: Ronin (itch) (aaisara12, Peter Sutarjo)
description:
Summary

There’s an old myth about the being known as the Ronin. Some say it’s the son of a legendary swordsman gone mad. Others claim it’s the Devil in the flesh. However, one thing’s for certain – it has an obsession with the temples of old, stalking their sacred grounds, massacring their defenders, and ransacking their chambers. Nobody has ever asked the Ronin why it does such strange things … well if there was someone, that person’s probably dead.

Controls

  • Move with WASD
  • Attack with L-CLICK
  • Roll with SPACE.
